display_long_description:
Welcome to Playroom Terror – VR Horror Escape, a terrifying virtual reality puzzle horror experience where your only goal is to survive.

Trapped in a creepy, abandoned playroom, you must explore your surroundings, solve challenging puzzles, and stay one step ahead of a terrifying living doll that hunts you down. Inspired by horror hits like Poppy Playtime, Five Nights at Freddy’s, and Hello Neighbor, this VR escape room game brings fear to life with immersive gameplay and spine-chilling moments.

Every object in the playroom can be the key to your escape—or your doom. Use your hands to interact, move silently, and hide when danger gets too close. The doll isn’t just creepy—it’s smart. It reacts to sound, light, and movement. One wrong move, and it’s game over.

🧠 Solve puzzles to unlock doors and secrets
👻 Avoid a haunted doll that stalks your every move
🎧 3D audio and eerie sounds that build suspense
🕹️ Full Meta Quest support for immersive controls
🏃 Escape room-style gameplay with horror twists

Do you have the nerves and brainpower to survive?

Perfect for fans of horror puzzle games, haunted dolls, and immersive VR experiences, Playroom Terror will push your fear to the limit. It’s not just a game—it’s a nightmare you’ll never forget.

Download now and try to escape… before it’s too late.
